_header: With eggs and flour a batter thou make
_description: A recipe ‘for fryturs’ — seven lines in couplets from the Liber Cure Cocorum

CamMagPep1047.First Lines:
With egges and flowre a batour thow makePut barme ther to I vnder
                    take…
CamMagPep1047.Last Lines:
…ffry ham in swete grece no more I mynCast sugur ther to yf
                    thow be gynne
CamMagPep1047.Facsimiles:
Hodgett,  G. A. J.,
                        ed.  
             Stere Htt Well: a book of medieval refinements, recipes and remedies,
                from a manuscript in Samuel Pepys’s library.
         Adelaide: Mary Martin Books, [1970?]; Cambridge, 1972.
